source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_000<tab>We're in Pyros, aye? You'll forgive me for expecting it to be a mite warmer. Bloody frustrating it is, having to dig into this damn permafrost...
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_000パゴス帯といい、ここといい、
寒いところばっかで、嫌になるぜ……。
次は、もうちょい作業しやすい土地だといいんだが……。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_010<tab>Bugger me, that quake was something else. Spent a good while after going round the buildings and checking for damage. I'll be damned if I'm gonna die buried beneath frozen timbers I helped put up myself!
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_010さっきの揺れは地震じゃねぇって話だが、
建物に異常がねぇか、念のために確認しておくか……。
この寒さの中で倒壊に巻き込まれたら、目も当てられねぇしな。

source: TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_020<tab>If you're looking for answers as to what in the hells is going on, you'd best look somewhere else. I'm no scholar, in case you haven't noticed. More practical matters like making sure people have places to lay their heads and whatnot are my concern.
target:
TEXT_CTSERKEUREKA3GUIDE2_00518_OPERATOR00510_000_020なんだか面倒なことになってるみてぇだが、
学のねぇ俺が考えたところで、何の意味もねぇ。
そんなことより、必要な作業を考えて準備しとかねぇとな。
